content: Anybody know why the FMG Agenda / minutes links have these mysterious and unpredictable IDs in the URL (e.g., https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=39160618) as opposed to other Jira spaces where the meetings have predictable URLs (e.g., https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIRI/FHIR+Infrastructure+Minutes+CC+20190729) ?
